newsitem.title: UK: B.A.T confident of US tobacco sales.
newsitem.headline: B.A.T confident of US tobacco sales.

text.p: UK tobacco and financial services group B.A.T Industries Plc said it did not think U.S. proposals on so-called "youth access" to tobacco would affect its sales of cigarettes in the U.S.
"We don't think it would. We have already introduced through many stores (there) age ID cards and we're quite happy for that," a B.A.T spokesman in London said on Thursday.
